review_text: È arrivato molto rapidamente e in modo sicuro.

Facile da usare e trasportare, compatta, dotata delle funzioni fondamentali per svolgere indagini termografiche elementari, ma anche di livello un po' più avanzato. La durata della batteria è sufficiente per indagini non molto prolungate, ma è comodo poterla ricaricare dalla USB tipo c. Immagini radiometriche salvabili anche su Cloud, molto comodo, a condizione di avere copertura internet.
review_title: 5,0 su 5 stelle Ottima macchina per diagnosi preliminare

review_text: Qualità costruttiva ottima.Uso molto facile, sia per utenti all'inizio che esperti: la macchina può operare in modo completamente automatico, scegliendo da sola l'intervallo di temperature di misura, ma permette di impostare manualmente i limiti inferiore e superiore.Trovo molto comoda la sovrapposizione tra la termografi ed un'immagine ordinaria; la parallasse tra le due si può compensare impostando manualmente la distanza dal piano di misura.Non ho messo cinque stelle, perché trovo l'uso dell'applicazione di aiuto alla documentazione un po' macchinosa; ma d'altra parte, la cosa non è grave per l'uso che ne faccio io (ricerca nell'ambito della micro-meteorologia).
review_title: 4,0 su 5 stelle Uso facilissimo, ed ottima qualità costruttiva.

review_text: Perfetto strumento di diagnosi rapida!!
review_title: 5,0 su 5 stelle Perfetto strumento di diagnosi Rapida

review_text: Dopo i primi giorni di "buon" funzionamento, si è improvvisamente bloccata. L'ho resa. Ad ogni modo la qualità del sensore non mi è apparsa poi così buona da giustificare questi costi. Brutta esperienza che non consiglio.

Nonostante il prezzo contenuto e la risoluzione bassa la termocamera fa egregiamente il suo lavoro. Le immagini sono relativamente ben definite e la tecnologia MSX aiuta moltissimo nell'interpretazione degli scenari. Tuttavia le funzionalità software della fotocamera sono molto immature e piene di bug:- Il wifi ha difficoltà a connettersi con molti router- Il servizio cloud ignite funziona poco e male: non sono mai riuscito a fargli caricare foto automaticamente nonostante l'opzione fosse stata abiltata nel menu della fotocamera, e il caricamento manuale dall'interfaccia ha funzionato una volta sola.- la fotocamera si è riavviata senza motivo un paio di volte- Il flash non ha mai funzionato neanche al buio, e non ho trovato sull interfaccia alcun modo di abilitarlo o disabilitarloConsiderato che senza l'ecosisema software della fotocamera ottengo la stessa qualità di immagine da una ONE Pro e che ho già un iPhone che ha un servizio di upload in cloud e image sharing che funziona :-) l'ho restituita e ho comprato una ONE Pro alla metà del costo
review_title: 3,0 su 5 stelle Tecnicamente un buon prodotto ma l'ecosistema software è molto immaturo

review_text: Acquisto effettuato per verificare alcune problematiche ipotizzate su impianto fotovoltaico e dispersioni termiche interno edificio. L'acquisto si è rilevato nel complesso utile per la parte di verifica del fotovoltaico anche se risulta necessario uno piccolo studio sull'interpretazione e la taratura della camera, mentre del tutto inutile per le verifiche interne. Le immagini interne hanno una qualità troppo inferiore alle aspettative, ho così deciso di procedere con il resto. Visto il prezzo consiglio di ponderare bene l'acquisto.
review_title: 3,0 su 5 stelle acquisto da ponderare adeguatamente

review_text: Non è il massimo da tenere

Flir C5, ancora in fase di test. Frequentemente va riavviata per piccoli bug. Prodotto funzionale ad un primo approccio alle immagini ad infrarossi. Combinata all'esperienza professionale può essere di supporto per moatrare al cliente eventuali criticità dell'involucro edilizio.
review_title: 3,0 su 5 stelle Flir C5 prime impressioni e test

review_text: Una stella perché il dispositivo che mi è stato inviato non è funzionante, all’accensione non porta a termine la procedura di avvio. Dalle recensioni negative per problemi di avvio identici mi viene il legittimo sospetto di pensare che i resi difettosi vengano rimessi in commercio senza opportuni controlli...effettuato subito il reso e riacquisterò il prodotto direttamente dal sito della FLIR...sotto a chi tocca!
review_title: 1,0 su 5 stelle Non funziona, neanche si accende

review_text: Meno di un giocattolo ,fatto il reso,pessimo sensore termico ,poco sensibile e super rumoroso ,statene alla larga .Avevo una Seek e nonostante fosse scarsissima ,confrontato con questa c5 era una signora termocamera .
La migliore
Ottimo strumento di lavoro... Da indicazioni interessanti... Consigliato

Easy to use and set-up, albeit long winded. Used it around the house to find dilapidated electric chargers, bad electric transformers, subsequently removed. Checked central heating and boiler flow and returns with aim of lowering temperature. Used it to find cold bridges in external walls, floors, and ceilings. Great tool for any household as you can find your self where the problems are before calling in the professionals. Cool tool for checking the composter.
review_date: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 14 maggio 2022
review_title: Does exactly what it says on the box.
review_flavor: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 14 maggio 2022

review_text: Excelente producto, nuevo empacado original. llego rapido

機械の温度測定用に購入しました。~400℃まで測定したい場合ならこれ一択かと思います。以前、スマートフォンに取り付けするタイプを購入し、すぐに壊れてしまい不安もありましたがこちらは頑丈で多少適当に扱っても壊れません。ファームウェアも安定しており、起動は長い（数十秒）ですが、フリーズや強制終了されることもありません。タッチパネルも直感的に操作でき、操作性にも優れます。２個買い温度比較しましたが、2~4℃のズレがありましたが放射温度計なので仕方ないかな、と思います。相対温度としてはほぼ一致していました。画角も広く、MSXで撮影もしやすいです。

This is the real deal FLIR, no cheap knockoffs here. As a general contractor I rely on detailed analysis of wall temperature differentials to identify potential wet spots and trace leaks and without this tool I simply can't do that. The picture quality is amazing and saving a photo is super easy. Delivering photos to the computer is also super easy with the wifi feature.It's lightweight and has a great battery life. The built in case is also super rubbey and does an amazing job of protecting the camera. Charging is fast and reliable and the startup time is remarkably short compared to a lot of thermal cameras I've used in the past.For the money nothing, absolutely nothing beats this compact and mighty thermal camera.

Ik had de Flir C5 gekozen boven de Seek Themal Shot Pro, omdat Flir mij een professioneler merk leek en de software van hogere kwaliteit is. Dit ondanks de lagere resolutie van de C5. Helaas had de unit die ik ontving problemen. De camera loopt vaak vast tijdens opstarten als de unit een paar uur niet gebruikt is. De laadbalk blijft dan op 1/3 hangen. De aan/uit knop lang of kort indrukken mocht ook niet baten om het probleem op te lossen. Unit is retour gegaan ivm dit defect.
review_date: Recensito nei Paesi Bassi il 4 aprile 2022
review_flavor: Recensito nei Paesi Bassi il 4 aprile 2022

review_text: Caméra solide et facile d utilisation, normal, c’est une Flir!

Received used (possibly refurbished) camera with tampered seal(already opened).Purchased from STS Shop seller.On opening camera has dust on top and bottom sides.Has smudge marks and scratches on left and right sides.Disappointing to receive used product especially for a premium product.Return window closed before arrival and took more than 3 weeks to arrive.Functionally seem to be ok and calibration certificate has september 2021 date and has no manufacturing date.
review_title: Received used camera with smudge marks

review_text: Utilizo la cámara para visualizar puentes térmicos en edificios, entre alguna otra inspección. La resolución es aceptable, lo que más me ha gustado es lo cómoda que es debido a su tamaño. Tiene diferentes opciones. Lo mejor, la relación calidad-precio. También incorpora una linterna, es útil para zonas oscuras que se pueda utilizar el modo de superposición de imagen visual en la térmica.Como punto negativo, el software, es complicado descargarlo, y viene limitado en algunas funciones al pago de una suscripción.
review_title: Cámara compacta con excelente relación calidad precio.

review_text: Einfach eine gute Wärmebildkamera. Amazon hatte mir zuerst die Flir C3 geschickt - wahrscheinlich versehentlich. Von der war ich wenig begeistert und habe sie wieder zurück geschickt. Die C5 finde ich dagegen um einiges besser, sie geht schneller an, das Bild ist größer und die Überlagerung mit dem Echtbild scheint auch besser zu funktionieren. Auch hat die C5 einen USB-C Anschluß, nicht so ein fummliges Micro-USB-Dings. WLAN geht wohl auch, habe das aber noch nicht ausprobiert. Mir ist es am liebsten, wenn ich das Gerät an USB anschließen kann und mir dann die Bilder wie von einem USB-Stick herunter ziehe.Zum Wärmebild gibt es nicht viel zu sagen - es funktioniert einwandfrei und ordentlich flott. Es wird auch die maximale- und minimale Temperatur angezeigt. Fazit: klare Kaufempfehlung.
Recebi dentro do prazo e em perfeito estado.

Extremely useful camera, found to have many uses. I use it to show up heat anomalies on electronic printed circuit boards, i.e. difference in temperature between adjacent RAM chips. Also used for investigating sources of heat loss around walls and doorways in my house. Very convenient feature of camera is that it always takes 2 photos (one infra-red, the other conventional photo so you get a handle on what it was you are seeing in infra-red. Very sensitive. Very compact and portable. Holds battery charge well. Wish I had bought one years ago!!!!!!!

2 things to know, the frames per second is noticeably slow. The picture size is smaller than most are used to by my guess. Being able to see hot spots in electronics, in the wall. Drawing power from a connection you can see the temp difference. Draft in a room, you can find where it is coming from. A hiding mammal you can see it.(if it moves the fps will be noticeable). Puddle on the ground, the temp difference can be noticeable. For what it can do I find it to be a good value for the price.
review_date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 26 dicembre 2023
review_flavor: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 26 dicembre 2023

review_text: Excelente câmera!! Muito versátil!!Deixa nada a desejar!! Satisfeitíssimo!!

This little camera is phenomenal! Being able to see the temperature of objects has been an incredible addition to my toolbox. I can see small tire leaks, radiator blockages, slight offsets in vent temperatures, electrical loads due to heat build up in wiring or fuses, and bad spots in heating elements. The usage cases for this thing are incredible! Well worth the investment.
review_date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 29 novembre 2023
review_title: Incredible portability and a very worthwhile tool for a mechanic
review_flavor: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 29 novembre 2023

review_text: Calidad asegurada, precisión por bandera

I strongly recommend this product - I use it for PCB board development, electrical engineering and occasional tracing of in wall power junction location and hot water pipes. It is quite easy to get started with this camera, of course for best results a little bit of reading on IR reflection index will help a lot. You can run the camera pretty much out of the box. The install process (first time your run the camera) is a bit lengthy but that is to be expected.A note to future owners: as with any precision equipment, if you plan to use this product professionally, I strongly recommend you look up for a firm/company that does metrological checkups - this way they can calibrate your camera - now Flir does this through their vendors and recommend you should do this every 2 years.The camera itself is very rugged, it is made of a heave rubbery like material and the screen indents in, so if you drop it on the ground it will not break.NOTE! The first picture is taken of the parking lot in front of my apartment at 11.30 PM (darkness). The mode is pure termal without any edges (it does not overlay the RGB picture and trace edges) - is just what the thermal camera sees. The photo is taken from the 12th floor (way beyond what Flir recommends as a shooting distance) about 50 meters from the parking lot. You can clearly see the cars with the "hot" engines.I am quite happy with this product! I strongly recommend
We are using it in our village to survey houses for heat loss. It is extremely easy to use and gives results that are simple and intuitive to understand. Brilliant camera!
review_date: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 16 febbraio 2022
review_flavor: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 16 febbraio 2022

review_text: J'ai comparer la température que donnait l'appareil par rapport à un thermomètre avec de l'eau très chaude, et le verdict était le même. Je trouve les endroits mal isolé dans le maison, je vois mes cables chauffant dans le planché, bref, très utile pour une quantité de domaine, frein, points chauds électriques, composantes électroniques qui chauffe et la température en plus. Bref, un petit bijoux.

Die Kamera zeigt ein deutliches Bild. Der Akku ist seh ausdauernd. Die Verbindung mit Cloud oder iPhone lässt zu wünschen übrig. Verbindung ist langsam und instabil. Auch ist es nicht einfach sich in den verscheiden Apps mit den verschiedenen Funktionen zurecht zu finden.

Pros:Compact, tripod connector, MSX software, USB-C charging, 2 yr warranty on unit, 10 years warranty on sensor.Cons:160x120 IR sensor, must have a steady hand when taking images.Overall, it's ok, although I think a bit sluggish and pricey, as you can get 320x160 sensors for approx 20% cheaper (but warranty or CS is v bad apparently).Wifi acquisition takes ages, hence to boot the thing - Only turn it on when you need to upload, otherwise it'll spend the first 10/15 seconds waiting to acquire a wifi signal - wasted time where you can't actually use the device.To change the 'spot light' function, you need to swipe down from the top of the screen to activate it.To change the brightness, you also need to swipe down and set it from there.To access the images, you can't simply connect it to a laptop, you must 'upload' it to the ignite.flir.com website where it will save images for you.You get approx 1G of upload data to save.Saving is easy, and you can select/create folders as you need, and also annotate the images as you take them.Image is of back on one of my racks at home.
review_date: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 10 aprile 2021
review_title: C5 - A little expensive for the price, but good overral
review_flavor: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 10 aprile 2021

review_text: Viendo otras reseñas negativas tuve muchas dudas antes de comprar la Flir C5, afortunadamente me decidí y estoy muy satisfecho. La Flir C5 es un artículo profesional muy buen construido, pero no es un juguete y hay que documentarse un poco para usarla, así es la termógrafia en general. La cámara es robusta, precisa, y práctica, con un tamaño ideal para llevar en los bolsos de la ropa de trabajo.Resumen, un buen artículo de calidad contrastada, pero hay que saber usarla.

review_text: Perfecta para climatizacion. Súper recomendable

Kaufgrund war das Argument, die Bilder der C3-X könnten - im Gegensatz zur C5 - nun per USB-Kabel auf den Computer übertragen werden. Das funktioniert aber leider nur begrenzt. Die C3-X wird nur eingeschränkt als Laufwerk erkannt. Die Aufnahmen werden vor dem Kopieren nicht als Bild, sondern nur als Dateinummer angezeigt. Man weiss also nicht, was man überträgt.Der Hersteller-Support ist überfordert, bzw. scheint die Kamera nicht zu kennen. Zunächst wurde ein Umtausch angeboten (aber das Angebot 1 Woche später wieder zurückgenommen), dann empfohlen, eine Software-Aktualisierung vorzunehmen (die letzte Version 2.7.20 war aber bereits installiert), dann behauptet, der USB-Anschluß meines Computer sei defekt (der Fehler ist aber bei allen 3 Bürorechnern der gleiche...), dann behauptet, der C3-X sei gar nicht defekt - ich solle ihn an Amazon zurücksenden.Kundendienst geht anders. Ich kann daher nur vom Kauf abraten.NACHTRAG vom 20.1.2022:Auf erneute Anfrage wurde zunächst gemutmaßt, das Problem läge am USB-Kabel und ich solle die Kamera auf Werkseinstellungen zurücksetzen. Auf ein irritiertes Nachfragen meinerseits wurde dann geantwortet: "Kein Firmware-Upgrade wird dieses Problem lösen. Während sich die Bilder noch auf dem Kameraspeicher befinden, werden sie von der Kamera "verwendet". Da sie "verwendet" werden, kann Windows sie nicht öffnen.Best regards, A(...) B(...), Technical Support Specialist, Teledyne FLIR"Die Flir C2 konnte das noch - jede meiner DSLRs natürlich auch...NACHTRAG 2 vom 25.1.2022 - der Fehler wird inzwischen immerhin erkannt, aber:"Ich habe Ihr Feedback an das Kameraentwicklungsteam weitergeleitet. Dies kann sich in Zukunft nach einem Software-Update ändern oder auch nicht.Best regards, Alexis Bonilla, Technical Support Specialist, Teledyne FLIR"Das grenzt schon an Real-Satire... Also (leider!) Abwertung auf nur noch einen Stern!
review_title: FLIR C3-X: Idee gut, Software nicht ausgereift, Support indiskutabel...

review_text: 一度購入したら、不良品で返品して再度新しい新品を購入したはずだけど、封止シールが切られてて、上からもう一枚貼ってあるんだけど、本当に新品なのか？一度目に購入した商品はシールが二重に貼られてる事は無かった。

Well made, rugged, good performance and the software menus are easy to navigate. Good battery life. Bright clear screen is large, making viewing easy. Drops right into a jacket pocket, easy to carry.We use it to spot bad chips on power amplifier circuit boards. You can't see it with the naked eye, but this camera shows the overheated chips glowing brightly on the screen. The boards are diagnosed in minutes instead of hours. For that reason alone it was worth the price.If you're new to infrared imaging, don't expect lots of megapixels, that would cost you a fortune. Instead, if you need more resolution just get closer to the subject. The resolution of this camera is adequate for my application. It has good file-transfer features which I haven't used yet.It also has another use that is equally wonderful. If a horse or cow doesn't come home at night, this camera can quickly spot them a long distance away. Likewise, a quick scan of the pasture confirms all are present and accounted for. It's better than a flashlight because they stand out among objects that conceal them such as fences, trees and bushes, which appear dark in the infrared image.
review_date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 10 gennaio 2021
review_title: Expensive but it has already paid for itself
review_flavor: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 10 gennaio 2021

review_text: Having two units become faulty in the spell of 10mins with both of them failing is not good nor impressive. The first one didn’t switch on just a black screen. The second one worked well for 7mins then wouldn’t switch off, with all the settings gone off the touch screen. I’ve been a building surveyor for a decade and have used flir equipment over this period. Granted the equipment I’ve used in the past was £10k and belonged to large organisations, this is only £650, and you do get what you pay for, however, I’m glad I tested the kit before going to site tomorrow. Albeit I will have to cancel the pathology inspection, I’d rather that, then be onsite with inadequate and failing equipment. It would have been embarrassing in front of the client who has paid for my time.Utter garbage save your money, either don’t bother or go to E5 or and above. I’ve just ordered an E6 at £2k, this should hopefully be an improvement over this piece of junk (putting it nicely). One reviewer stated the C2 they owned, which this unit is based on would make a great expensive paper weight. I fully agree.The only positive from this experience is Amazon and their after sales customer care. 100% satisfaction, sent me a second unit before Monday with the first unit delivered Friday (24 hours turnaround) Thank you Amazon and your support team via email and online chatting.
review_date: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 6 settembre 2020
review_flavor: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 6 settembre 2020

review_text: Would love to be a sponsor lolOver all great toolSize like a phone fits in your pocketIn my photo you can see the engine I scannedHas two missing cylinderWould like to try other products from FLIRThanks FLIR
review_title: Awesome for mechanic to look inside an engine

review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS CRAP! I am not a pro plumber, by all means, but handled hundreds of cameras so far (pro cameras). I've bought the flir in order to save some money finding a leak in my house and for some future use on occasions. I've used it about ten times for a short while and it literally froze twice, the second time happened when I really needed it to check on a leak that was coming from the roof and it froze on me, when this thing happens basically I have to wait until the battery totally get discharged which takes a few hours, and basically kills your day. Just to think of a professional who takes it to work and this Expensive Useless Tool Freezes on him 20% of the time. Add to it the website that is so unfriendly to users, and the first time when it happened to me, I was in Israel checking the property and this thing just froze, I've called the flir representative/the only importer for advice and help and they flatly send me back to seek for help from the people I've bought it from. There is seven hours difference between the U.S. and Israel and the cost of a call by itself is very expensive. I understand that most users will use it in the U.S. only, but if you are willing to take a chance to be out of your camera one time out of five while on the road working and basically have an EXPENSIVE USELESS ROCK THAT YOU WERE COUNTING ON. Go ahead and throw your money into the garbage. Based on my bad experiences, I'll be looking for something else! I hope that this will help you with your decision.
review_date: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 31 dicembre 2020
review_flavor: Recensito negli Stati Uniti il 31 dicembre 2020
